name: Mega Paratrooper
overview: A multi-genre game primarily a shooter consisting of 4 levels\gates. The first gate called Fight in Space is pure shooter. The second, Space Harbor, you must choose three of the correct add-ons to progress (the wrong ones will end the game). Space Harbor Deeper Rooms is an insanely-long snake game. Ultimate Fight is a safe-cracking game which seems impossible because the code could be anything! First published in Game On 1990/02.
